body.name: Menggood Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, 2K Battery Powered Outdoor Camera Wireless AI&PIR Motion Detection, Spotlight&Siren, Color Night Vision, 2-Way Audio Security Camera Outdoor/Indoor (4 Pack)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 23 hrs 58 mins
features: Wireless & Rechargeable & Waterproof - Equipped with wireless functionality, Security camera offer hassle-free installation, eliminating the need for cumbersome cables, allowing install virtually anywhere with the provided, bracket and screw. With a weather-resistant design, they stand resilient against the elements, providing reliable performance in rain, snow, or intense sunlight.【*Only work with 2.4Ghz WiFi】

Full HD Camera & Color Night Vision - Security cameras wireless outdoor boast 2K high-definition video quality, ensuring crystal-clear footage even in challenging outdoor environments. Dual light source night vision home security cameras. Full-color night vision and infrared night vision are two-way options. Visible range up to 33 feet. Even under low light conditions, it can capture clear and colorful images.

PIR Motion Detection & Instant Alerts - Outdoor security cameras has PIR human body infrared detection, which can effectively reduce false alarms caused by leaves, rain and snow, etc. Once the outdoor camera wireless detects motion, the AI PIR sensor will trigger in real time and receive notifications in a timely manner on the mobile device app. And this surveillance cameras can be shared with multiple users.

Two-Way Talk & Siren Alarm - This outside camera has a built-in microphone and speaker and the real-time two-way audio function allows you to talk with the visitor in front of the wireless camera through the APP. The home cameras is also equipped with alarms and spotlights, which can manually trigger a loud alarm through the APP to warn intruders and protect vulnerable areas outside your yard, driveway, and other areas.

No Subscription Fee - The home security camera supports SD card and cloud storage. It provides rolling 3-day cycled cloud storage that you can enjoy storage service without any subscription. You can also subscribe to get longer cycle recording storage time. It also supports local micro SD card storage up to 256GB (not included).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page No Subscriptions Fee Home security camera provides permanent free rolling 3-day cycled cloud storage. Next page 1 AI&PIR Motion Detection 2 Cloud Storage & SD Card

Q：Where is the Micro SD slot and reset button on the wireless camera? A：The SD card slot is located at the bottom of the wireless security camera. Open the bottom dust plug and you will see the SD card slot, power supply, USB port, and reset button. Q：How to add a wireless camera to connect to the network? A：You need to download and register the app "O-KAM", scan the QR code on the side of the camera using the app, correctly enter your WiFi account and password, and then scan the QR code generated by your phone using the security camera. Click "Bind Now" Q：How do I reconnect the camera after replacing WiFi? A：You need to reset the outdoor camera. The reset button is located in the card slot at the bottom of the security camera. Long press for 6-8 seconds to clear the pairing network information of the camera, and then scan the QR code to reconnect. Q：How many users can I share outdoor wireless cameras with? A：There is no limit to user sharing Q：Is cloud storage permanently free for 3 days? A：Our security camera provides a permanent free 3-day event recording cycle. If you need to record for a longer time, you can choose to use a Micro SD card (up to 256GB) or subscribe to cloud services.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Easy to install. You can see a wide area with great picture clarity. Nice features, light, alarm. I bought 2 packages of 4, O love how easy they are to use. I wish the battery lasted longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, affordable camera! No subscription needed
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this camera because it was a good price and most importantly for me required no subscription. There’s an option but you don’t have to get it.Easy to setupAffordableApp is easy to use and you can adjust settings to your likingPicture quality is good and the alerts help me keep my packages safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Outdoor security camera
reviews.reviewText: Camera works very well. It was a little bit tricky to set up, but nevertheless, was able to get it set up to the Wi-Fi. The quality is very good. I would recommend buying this camera was not too expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not have all the different detection options! ONLY HUMAN
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Customer service is amazing. They refunded me and apologized for the misleading information and have changed the details to what the cameras are actuallycapable of. I am using them in a different location that does not need the extra capabilities and was able to purchase dofferent cameras for where I was going to use these. For a very basic camera these are actually not bad and I would recommend them based on that and how wonderful customer service was. So if your looking for a basic camera these are a decent option! The camera is OK. It has great picture and sound quality I will give it that but I feel like I was lied to. These cameras do not have all the variations in detection that they say they do. No package, no pet and no vehicle detection ONLY human section and human frame. Its motion sensor does work amazingly but the only options are human or no choice and it detects every motion. Unfortunately I can not return them as I missed the 30 day option because I didn't set them up right away as our front porch area was under construction and there was no where to put them without risk of being destroyed so I left my old cameras up instead. If I had known and looked at them prior to use I absolutely would have returned them because the different detection options were the only reason I purchased them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Innovative Cameras work quite well!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a new pair of security cameras from Menggood and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. The cameras are not only sleek and stylish but also packed with features that have significantly enhanced the security of my home. One of the standout features for me is the motion detection. It’s highly sensitive and accurate, sending instant alerts to my phone whenever there’s movement in the camera’s field of view. This gives me peace of mind, knowing that I’ll be immediately alerted to any potential security issues. In terms of durability, the cameras are robust and weather-resistant, making them perfect for outdoor use. They’ve withstood various weather conditions and have continued to function optimally. Overall, I am thrilled with my new security cameras from Menggood. They deliver high-quality surveillance and ease of use, all at a reasonable price. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to enhance their home security.

reviews.reviewText: The great picture quality and easy-to-use app make these cameras a solid purchase for me.
